projects.title: Machine Learning Model Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive web dashboard for visualizing machine learning model performance, training metrics, and data insights. Features real-time monitoring, interactive charts, and model comparison tools built for my thesis project on deep learning.

projects.title: Photography Portfolio API
projects.description: RESTful API for managing photography portfolios with automatic EXIF data extraction, image processing, and metadata management. Includes features for batch processing, image optimization, and geographic tagging.

projects.title: Swedish Language Processing Research
projects.description: Research project on computational linguistics using transformer models for Swedish language processing. Focuses on sentiment analysis and named entity recognition for Swedish social media content.

projects.title: KTH Course Planning Tool
projects.description: A web application to help KTH students plan their course schedules, track prerequisites, and visualize their academic progress. Built during my studies to solve a real problem I and my classmates faced.

projects.title: Aurora Borealis Prediction App
projects.description: Mobile app that predicts aurora visibility based on solar activity, weather conditions, and geographic location. Includes push notifications for optimal viewing conditions in Swedish Lapland.

projects.title: Deep Learning Image Classifier
projects.description: Convolutional Neural Network for classifying Swedish wildlife from camera trap images. Achieved 94% accuracy on test dataset. Part of a collaboration with Swedish Environmental Protection Agency.

projects.title: Swimming Performance Tracker
projects.description: Web application for tracking swimming workouts, analyzing performance trends, and setting training goals. Built to help my local swimming club digitize their training logs.

projects.title: Quantum Mechanics Visualization
projects.description: Interactive web-based visualizations of quantum mechanical phenomena including wave functions, probability distributions, and particle behavior. Educational tool for physics students.

projects.title: Smart Home IoT System
projects.description: DIY home automation system using Raspberry Pi and Arduino for controlling lights, temperature, and security cameras. Features web dashboard and mobile app for remote control.
